Services.name: Online Book Browsing
Services.text: Browse the entire library collection online from the comfort of your home. Search and explore various genres, authors, and books available for borrowing.

Services.name: Book Recommendations
Services.text: Get personalized book recommendations based on your reading history and preferences, helping you discover new books.

Services.name: Due Date Reminders
Services.text: Receive automated reminders for due dates to ensure you return borrowed books on time, helping you avoid fines.

Services.name: Book Reviews and Ratings
Services.text: Share your opinions and read reviews from other users on the books you borrow. Rate your books to help others make informed choices.

Services.name: Group Book Borrowing
Services.text: Collaborate with friends or study groups to borrow books together. Track group borrowing status and manage shared book lists.

Features.title: Book Catalog
Features.text: Browse through an extensive collection of books, categorized by genre, author, and publication date.

Features.title: Search Books
Features.text: Easily search for books by title, author, genre, or keywords, making it quick to find the book you're looking for.

Features.title: User Account Management
Features.text: Create and manage your personal account, track your borrowed books, and view your borrowing history.

Features.title: Book Borrowing
Features.text: Borrow books for a specified period and keep track of your due dates, with reminders to return books on time.
